Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.dexter.bookmarkplaces.screens.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    This class takes care of capturing location data from GPS and its relevant data provided by user

    mitesh.patel
